title: Suspicious code fragments
body:
Hello.
I have checked the MSBuild code using the PVS-Studio analyzer. The analyzed code corresponds to this [commit](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/tree/7e539c169a657040eeb768e8115c44f1780e59df). The results of the check revealed several suspicious code fragments, which I included in the [article](https://pvs-studio.com/en/blog/posts/csharp/1222/). You might be interested in taking a look at them.
